code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import'../styles/TopPicks.css';import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Toppicks=()=>{const[topPicks,setTopPicks]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const savedTopPicks=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("favourites"))||[];setTopPicks(savedTopPicks);},[]);const handleRemove=id=>{const updatedTopPicks=topPicks.filter(item=>item._id!==id);setTopPicks(updatedTopPicks);localStorage.setItem("favourites",JSON.stringify(updatedTopPicks));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-picks",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Top Picks"}),topPicks.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"top-picks-not",children:"No items in Top Picks"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"top-picks-container",children:topPicks.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-pick-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.name,className:"top-pick-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-picks-detials",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Material:"})," ",item.name]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate(`/products/${item._id}`),className:"top-picks-btn",children:"View"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"top-picks-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleRemove(item._id),className:"top-picks-remove",children:"Remove"})})]},item._id))})]});};export default Toppicks;
